name: Cards & Caverns (Moonslicer)
description:
A lonesome dragonborne finds himself in a large dungeon, not know the magic that lies within. Magic itself relies on 3 elements: water, earth, and fire. water beats fire, earth beats water, and fire beats earth.

Controls: arrow keys to move, Z to cast a spell card, X to attack with your sword

Made by: Rj3, Moonslicer, Music in Minutes.
